message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $112. This is my final offer, so I'd appreciate it if you could make a decision.
I understand you're at your minimum price, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
I've decided to sell the product to another buyer who is willing to pay the minimum price of $100. Sorry, Bob!
